---

The navigation overlay error has been fixed! The issue was that the navigation structure was missing its proper container elements:

**Problem Fixed:**

- **Missing opening tags**: The navigation list items were orphaned without proper `<nav>`, `<ul>`, and opening `<li>` containers
- **Broken HTML structure**: SVG and link elements were floating without their parent list item

**Solution Applied:**

- Added proper `<nav class="sidebar" id="sidebar">` container
- Added `<ul class="nav-menu">` wrapper for the navigation items
- Wrapped the first navigation item properly in `<li class="nav-item">` tags
- Maintained the existing closing tags that were already present

The navigation structure now follows proper HTML semantics and should function correctly with the existing CSS styles and JavaScript functionality.
